articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Director General of Mongolian News Agency Montsame
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Director General of Mongolian News Agency Montsame
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Avia Baatarhuyag, director general of the Mongolian News Agency Montsame who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Chang Gwang, director general of the KCNA, and staff members of the Mongolian embassy here.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Montsame Director General
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Montsame Director General
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Avia Baatarhuyag, director general of the Mongolian News Agency Montsame.
					 The visiting director general handed the gift to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday.

articles.title: SPA Chairman Meets EP Delegation
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Meets EP Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Choe Thae Bok met and had a talk with the delegation for relations with the Korean Peninsula of the European Parliament led by Chairman Herbert Reul which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday. 
					 Present there was Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the DPRK-EU Friendship Parliamentary Group.

articles.title: National Seminar Held on Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Leading War to Victory
articles.content:
National Seminar Held on Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Leading War to Victory
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place at the Central Youth Hall here on Thursday to deeply study and grasp President Kim Il Sung's undying exploits performed in leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory and add glory to them.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of party, armed forces and power organs and working people's organizations and those in the fields of science, education, literature and art, media and the preservation of revolutionary relics and the institutions for training party officials.
					
					 Presented at the seminar were papers explaining and proving the undying exploits the President performed by leading the war to victory.
					
					 Noting the victory in the war was a brilliant fruition of the Juche-oriented military idea and outstanding commanding art of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the speakers said:
					
					 No sooner had the U.S. imperialist aggressors started their all-out surprise invasion against the DPRK than the President set forth a strategic policy on crushing the enemy forces through a prompt counter-attack. He set forth various strategies including the formation of the strong second front with regular forces and harassing of the rear of the enemy, thus taking an initiative in the war and opening up a new phase. 
					
					 The ideas of properly combining large-unit operations with small-unit ones, regular-army warfare with guerrilla warfare and conducting well mountain warfare and nighttime warfare, aircraft and tank-hunting team movements, sniper team movement and other original military ideas and war methods created by the President served as sources of the strength to work such a miracle as shattering the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The President always found out weak points of the enemies to annihilate them and scrupulously organized operations with his matchless pluck and guts and superb commanding art.
					
					 He also clarified the immutable truth that the political and ideological power of the masses, not any weaponry or military technology, plays a decisive role in the war. He inflicted an ignominious defeat upon the U.S., the first of its kind in history, by giving fullest play to the mental power of the service personnel and people in the whole period of the war.
					
					 The speakers underscored the need for all the officials, party members and other people to eternally glorify the undying exploits the President performed by winning the war and the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of him and general secretary Kim Jong Il, create a new speed of a great surge of Songun Korea and work hard to attain a final victory in the struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve national reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ten-Day Film Show Opens to Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Ten-Day Film Show Opens to Mark War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A ten-day film show was opened in the DPRK to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 "The Fatherly Leader Is among Soldiers", "Under the Guidance of the Great Brilliant Commander", "By Carrying Forward the Songun Revolutionary Cause of Mt. Paektu" and other documentary films will be shown at cinema houses and halls of culture in Pyongyang and other local areas during the day. They deal with the undying Songun revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 "The Nation and Destiny", "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order", "Wolmi Island", "A Photograph" and other feature films will also be shown.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of film art and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, vice-minister of Culture and director general of the General Film Bureau, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony its participants watched documentary film "President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il Were Always Together on the Road of Great Songun-based Leadership".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Leads Korean War to Victory (5)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Leads Korean War to Victory (5)
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- During the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953), President Kim Il Sung created a wave of unique war methods to counter the enemy's attack in the air and on the ground.
					 Typical of them were aircraft-hunting and tank-hunting team movements and the use of direct-firing guns on heights.
					
					 The aircraft-hunting team movement was aimed to overpower the U.S. air raids with all kinds of small arms as well as anti-aircraft guns.
					
					 He saw to it that such a kind of team was organized in all army units, indicating the ways for forming and arming the teams and arranging their firing positions.
					
					The teams, together with air corps of the Korean People's Army, shot down nearly 3,000 enemy planes in two years.
					
					 The tank-hunting teams, organized on the order of Kim Il Sung in August Juche 40 (1951), attacked enemy tanks with anti-tank grenades or mines. A total of 200 tanks were destroyed in 1952 alone.
					
					 The sniper teams, organized on his order in each company of frontline units in November 1951, shot to death 16 890 enemy troops in a little more than one year.
					
					 The use of direct-firing guns on heights accorded with geographical conditions of Korea. It made it possible to pound the attacking enemies and their bases.
					
					 Such unique war methods greatly helped win the war against the U.S., who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.

articles.title: "Arirang" Performance Ready to Open
articles.content:
"Arirang" Performance Ready to Open
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" is ready to open as part of the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					 The performance has been prepared in a more fascinating way than the preceding ones.
					
					 The newly-created scenes and acts, synchronized with songs and pictures and letters shown on the background stand, will intensively represent the undying feats Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed in winning the war, as well as the feats Generalissimo Kim Jong Il performed in leading the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 The performance will also show the great personality of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and the achievements made by the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea under his guidance.
					
					 Kim Mok Ryong, general director of the performance, told KCNA that the "Arirang" performance is a fruition of the mental power displayed by creative workers and performers to significantly mark the 60th anniversary of the war victory.
					
					 "Arirang" will raise its curtain at May Day Stadium here on July 22.

articles.title: Weightlifting Aces on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Weightlifting Aces on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Kwang Song, a weightlifter of the April 25 Sports Team in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, has come under spotlight of experts.
					 He came first in the men's 77kg snatch of the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					
					 Kim began learning weightlifting at the age of 12 and has distinguished himself since he was 14 years old.
					
					 He has been active at the April 25 Sports Team since Juche 97 (2008).
					
					 In the 2012 Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championship, the first international game for him, he won three gold medals in the 77kg category of the junior event.
					
					 He set two new national records in the 1st-class weightlifting tournament held as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games this year.
					
					 He is now intensifying training in an aim to break the world's record.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms "IS Reform" Charade
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms "IS Reform" Charade
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are staging a sinister charade to deceive the people as they are driven to a tight corner by the case of the interference of the Intelligence Service (IS) in the "presidential election" and opening of the minutes of inter-Korean summit. 
					 They announced "IS reform" all of a sudden to calm down public criticism, but, in fact, they are behaving quite contrary to it. 
					
					 This is clear from the fact that the south Korean chief executive said that the IS should propose "its own reform program" and the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea claimed that the IS should present "its reform plan," to begin with, talking about "its nature as a secret institution." This is little short of advising the accused to seek a way for justifying and legalizing his future actions, instead of questioning the accused. In a word, this is a revelation of their intention to shield the criminal and become a partner of the IS. 
					
					 As a matter of fact, the south Korean ruling quarters are working hard to increase the fascist function and role of the IS under the signboard of "IS reform." 
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the south Korean puppet group is working with bloodshot eyes over a "bill", insisting that "the mandate to control all forms of cyber terror" meaning the unlimited watch and the right to handle information about various social circles should be given to the IS.
					
					 If the IS is allowed to have the above-said mandate while exercising extraterritorial rights as now, this will entail serious consequences. This is the unanimous mindset of south Korean people today.
					
					 A clear proof of this is that when people of various circles demanded a ban on IS agents' entry into public organs and the reduction of its intelligence gathering function, the south Korean authorities blustered that "pro-north forces" should be handled by the IS and it is hard to completely dismantle departments for gathering intelligence, trumpeting about "forces following the north".
					
					 The upbeat agents of the IS have gone so shameless as to claim that they have so far "pushed forward its own reform including readjustment of business rules and personnel reshuffle". 
					
					 All facts go to prove that the south Korean ruling quarters are loudmouthed about "IS reform" under the pressure of people from all walks of life, but they are working in the direction of strengthening dictatorship, ensuring ruling security and stepping up the policy of confrontation through it. 
					
					 The "IS reform" means reinforcing its fascist dictatorial system and it will only result in the unlimited suppression of the people desirous of independence and democratization of south Korean society and national reunification and political opposition forces. 
					
					 The existence of the IS, which earned an ill fame by unhesitatingly killing "the president of south Korea", will never bring security to the present ruling quarters. 
					
					 As demanded by the people of all social standings of south Korea, the IS should not be "reformed" but be disbanded totally.

articles.title: Director General of Montsame Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Director General of Montsame Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Avia Baatarhuyag, director general of the Mongolian News Agency Montsame, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Thursday.
					 He paid respects to Generalissimos before their statues. 
					
					 Then he paid homage to the Generalissimos in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 He looked round the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Director General of Mongolian News Agency Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Director General of Mongolian News Agency Visits Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Avia Baatarhuyag, director general of the Mongolian News Agency Montsame, Thursday visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary life of the President and patriotic and revolutionary family members of Mangyongdae, he looked round historic relics preserved there with great care. 
					
					 At the end of his visit he said the President devoted his all to the struggle for freedom and independence of the country, adding that Korea's liberation was one of his great achievements.
					
					 He also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, National Gifts Exhibition House and Rungna Dolphinarium.

articles.title: Many Heroes Produced by Schools Named after Wartime Heroes
articles.content:
Many Heroes Produced by Schools Named after Wartime Heroes 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Many heroes of the Republic and labor heroes have been produced by universities and schools named after wartime heroes. 
					 Sunchon University of Chemical Engineering was named after Hero of the Republic Ri Su Bok who died heroic death at the age of 18 by silencing an enemy pillbox with his body during the battle on Height 1211, thus opening the way to the unit's charge. This university produced heroes of the Republic and labor heroes including Hong Chun Sik, Ri Hui Yun and Jon Pom Jun. 
					
					 Jo Kun Sil Wonsan University of Technology produced Twice Labor Hero Jong Yong Man and six other heroes. Jong Yong Man, Kim Il Sung Prize winner and people's artist, earned fame in Korean paintings by creating the masterpiece "The Evening Glow over Kangson". 
					
					 Kim Jong Hul Primary School in Kim Chaek City produced 10 heroes. Kim Jong Hul was a pilot who destroyed an enemy warship through a kamikaze attack. 
					
					 Jo Ok Hui was the first woman hero during the wartime. She was arrested by the enemy during the temporary strategic retreat. Though she lost her both eyes due to enemy's cruel torture, she died heroic death, shouting "Long live General Kim Il Sung!" Jo Ok Hui Haeju Teacher Training College produced a disabled soldier hero.
					
					 Jang Thae Hwa was a hero who blocked the enemy's gun muzzle with his chest at the age of 22. Jang Thae Hwa Senior Secondary School in Sakju County produced several heroes who performed feats in socialist construction. 
					
					 Ri Chol Un, Kim Chang Hak, Kim Kuk Jin, Ri Chun Hui, An Ok Bo and many other heroes have been produced by the schools named after wartime heroes. They performed feats in defending the leader and social system, in major construction projects and education of young people. 
					
					 This clearly proves that the traits of living and working like the heroes who bravely fought, unhesitatingly devoting their lives during the wartime, are being fully displayed generation after generation.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Arrests Member of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Arrests Member of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean police Wednesday arrested Kim Se Chang, a member of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), on charges of violation of the ill-famed "Security Law".
					 The police had already searched his house in the course of wholesale search operation against the houses of leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon on June 26. The police took such action for the mere reason that he did not comply with the two rounds of summoning for questioning.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Accused of Arms Buildup
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Accused of Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea on Monday released a commentary denouncing the puppet military authorities for increasing military spending.
					 The commentary recalled that the Defense Ministry submitted to the Ministry of Planning and Finance the next year's budget 6.9 percent higher than this year's.
					
					 This is an action disregarding the difficulties the people are suffering in their living due to economic crisis, it charged.
					
					 The military authorities openly claimed that an increased budget is necessary for establishing a preemptive attack system and the building a missile shield to cope with nukes and missiles of the north and introducing new type fighters, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The introduction of weapons for preemptive attack is a dangerous move for sparking a crisis on the Korean Peninsula and an all-out war.
					
					 It demanded a cutdown of the budget for introducing weapons for preemptive attack, a threat to the peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: Candlelight Actions in Protest against IS's Interference in Election Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Actions in Protest against IS's Interference in Election Unabated in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Candlelight actions are going on in south Korea in protest against the puppet Intelligence Service's illegal interference in the election.
					 A candlelight rally condemning the IS was held outside the head office of Dong-A Ilbo on Tuesday, the 26th day since south Korean students' start of candlelight action.
					
					 Students and citizens attended the rally, holding slogan boards "Make thorough-going state investigation" and "Park Geun Hye, own responsibility for the case" and candlelights in their hands.
					
					 Speakers termed the IS's interference in the election a coup.
					
					 They said the authorities committed a coup by trampling down the people at the point of bayonet in the past but are now staging a coup by use of the IS and conservative media.
					
					 The IS is now talking about any reform but it is nonsensical, they charged.
					
					 They called for carrying on candlelight actions till the present chief executive, the very one responsible for the case of the IS's interference, steps down, being accountable for it.

articles.title: British Organizations Laud Kim Jong Un as Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
British Organizations Laud Kim Jong Un as Iron-willed Commander
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 4 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the awarding of the title of the DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 The awarding of the title to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was an expression of absolute support and deep trust of all the Korean people in him, the statement said.
					
					 He displayed outstanding commanding art in the fierce confrontation with the arrogant U.S. imperialists styling themselves as the only superpower in the world, it noted, and went on:
					
					 He declared an all-out death-defying campaign against the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and wisely led the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean-style socialism and the sovereignty of the DPRK have been firmly defended thanks to him.
					
					 He is an invincible and iron-willed commander identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will win a final victory and reunify the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by UK Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by UK Organization
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article on July 10 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the awarding of the title of the DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 The last one year is the period in which we have keenly realized the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is, indeed, another great commander of Mt. Paektu who is identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the article said.
					
					 When the DPRK launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, the U.S. imperialists and their followers prodded the UN Security Council into adopting the unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" against it, far from congratulating it on its scientific and technological success, it noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that the DPRK reacted to this with toughest countermeasures, it said, and went on:
					
					 These countermeasures struck terror into the hearts of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is further glorifying the invincible tradition of the Korean People's Army, the revolutionary armed forces of Juche type, which was founded and developed by the Generalissimos.
					
					 He set forth a strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 This line is a brilliant succession to the line on simultaneously developing the economy and defence upbuilding which was advanced and thoroughly implemented by the Generalissimos and its development in depth onto a new high stage.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Figure Congratulates Korean People on War Victory Day
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Figure Congratulates Korean People on War Victory Day 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, released an article on July 12 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 He said that the Korean people won a brilliant victory in the three-year-long Fatherland Liberation War under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He noted that the great victory won by the heroic Korean people is shedding its rays as an example in the struggle for accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are making the whole gamut of desperate efforts to ignite another war on the Korean Peninsula, oblivious of a lesson from their disgraceful defeat, he said, and went on:
					
					 All the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. and in the building of socialist construction under the banner of Songun are instilling great strength and courage into the world progressives aspiring after independence.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will certainly build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Figures Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Figures Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign figures sent floral baskets to DPRK missions on July 8 and 9 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were the chairman of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the chief of the Belgian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.
					
					 The floral baskets were laid before a full-length painting of Kim Il Sung standing together with general secretary Kim Jong Il and their portraits.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian national meeting was held in Lima on July 12 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Speeches were made by the international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) who doubles as chairman of the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War, the chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru and others.
					
					 The speakers praised the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as the invincible and iron-willed commander and outstanding strategist who shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists in the war, adding he is a symbol of eternal victory of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 They noted that he smashed the numerical and technological advantages of the U.S. imperialists with his outstanding strategy and tactics and original war methods and that the Korean people have worked miracles and brought about great innovations in socialist construction with the same spirit as displayed in defeating the U.S. imperialists under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists committed inhuman crimes during the Korean war and have recently created the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula by instigating their satellite forces to step up the moves for stifling the DPRK, the speakers said.
					
					 They stressed that with no desperate move can the imperialists bring to their knees the heroic Korean people who were trained by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and are remaining true to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed belief that the party, army and people of the DPRK would always win victory in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists as they are led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in Great Fatherland Liberation War Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in Great Fatherland Liberation War Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees were inaugurated in over 60 countries and regions so far since the Oceanic regional preparatory committee was formed on March 1 to grandly celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The preparatory committees were organized on a nationwide scale in Nepal, Pakistan, Benin, Romania, Nigeria and Denmark. A preparatory committee comprising people of various circles and preparatory committees of Nakhodka City, the Korean War Veterans' Council and the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association were formed in Russia.
					
					 Present at inaugural ceremonies were leaders of progressive political parties including the Baath Arab Socialist Party of Syria, Ukrainian Communist Party, Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), Socialist Party of Benin, Socialist Party of Romania, Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and the Communist Party of Democratic Congo.
					
					 Famous personages of governments, political parties, organizations and regional organizations were elected chairpersons of the preparatory committees.
					
					 They included the department director of the Ugandan presidency, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, chairman of the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named After Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association and the chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification.
					
					 The committees at the inaugural ceremonies underscored the significance of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and discussed and decided on the issue of raising voices for solidarity with socialist Korea which is unswervingly advancing in the van of the anti-imperialist struggle today when the imperialists have become rampant in aggression moves and arbitrariness.
					
					 The preparatory committees are conducting activities to significantly celebrate July 27, the victory day of the Korean people, who are frustrating every move of the imperialist allied forces against the DPRK with the might of Songun.
					
					 Colorful functions are taking place in different countries.
					
					 They included meetings, seminars, round-table talks, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in China, Russia, Nepal, Peru and Germany and by international and regional organizations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism Is a Science" was published in booklet on July 9 by the Rome Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea of Italy.
					 The work, made public on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is the most scientific and viable one. It also clearly explains the principled issues arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Russia and Guinea between July 5 and 9 to commemorate the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. They included a seminar and film show in Russia and a lecture and film show in Guinea.
					 Korean films including "Pyongyang at Night" were shown at the film shows.
					
					 The speakers including the secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an outstanding strategist and iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and this is recognized by the world. One can know well about his greatness when seeing the gifts he received now displayed at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and his politics of love for people, the DPRK is making great achievements every day.
					
					 A Guinean figure gave a lecture on the subject "President Kim Il Sung is the eternal sun of Juche". He said:
					
					 19 years have passed since the demise of Kim Il Sung but the world progressives have always highly praised and revered him as the eternal sun of Juche. 
					
					 The exploits he performed by hewing out the era of independence and dedicating his whole life to the successful advance of the human cause of independence will shine long.
					
					 His idea and cause have been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-chairperson of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association in Guinea said the gifts Kim Il Sung received from various countries reflect the profound reverence of all people for him. He will always live as the sun of humankind, the vice-chairperson added.

articles.title: MINREX demanda a autoridades panamenas dejar el barco comercial Chongchongang
articles.content:
MINREX demanda a autoridades panamenas dejar el barco comercial Chongchongang
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- En rueda exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 17 con motivo del caso de retencion en Panama del barco comercial coreano Chongchongang, el vocero del MINREX de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta:
					 Recientemente, ocurrio un incidente anormal en que las autoridades de investigacion de Panama retuvieron el barco comercial de nuestro pais Chongchongang, que salio del puerto de La Habana e iba a pasar por el canal de Panama, bajo las infundadas sospechas de "transporte de drogas".
					
					 Bajo el rotulo de la "investigacion de drogas", las autoridades panamenas arrestaron al capitan y los tripulantes coreanos atacandoles con violencia y registraron por la fuerza el cargamento.
					
					 Cuando no pudieron descubrir ninguna droga, ellas intentan defender su accion violenta cuestionando otra carga.
					
					 Esta carga se trata de armas viejas que deben ser reparadas y devueltas a Cuba segun el contrato legitimo.
					
					 Las autoridades de Panama deben tomar la medida de permitir de inmediato la salida de nuestros marineros y barco retenidos.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones Norte-Sur para operacion de ZIK
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones Norte-Sur para operacion de ZIK
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong la 4a ronda de conversaciones de trabajo entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea para normalizar la operacion de esa zona.
					 En la ocasion la parte nortena presento las propuestas sinceras y practicas para normalizar y desarrollar cuanto antes la zona industrial tales como el asunto de prevenir la reinterrupcion de operacion de la zona que incluye no hacer todos los actos politicos y militares que puedan obstaculizar la operacion normal de la ZIK, etc., el de preparar el organismo y el mecanismo institucional para garantizar satisfactoriamente la operacion estable y las actividades empresariales de la ZIK, el de proteger la seguridad personal y bienes invertidos, el de viaje, comunicacion y aduana,  el de convertir la ZIK en una zona de cooperacion economica capaz de competir en escala internacional.
					
					 Pero, la parte surena tomo la actitud insolente e insincera de crear las dificultades artificiales en resolver los problemas proponiendo solo la responsabilidad del estado de la ZIK y la garantia unilateral por la prevencion de reinterrupcion.
					
					 Al hablar de la normalizacion de la ZIK no preparo siquiera el proyecto de acuerdo, base de consulta, asi que intento mostrar solo la forma de hacer las conversaciones repitiendo las conversaciones.
					
					 A pesar de los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC las conversaciones terminaron sin resultado debido a las injustas insistencias e insinceras actitudes de la parte surena.
					
					 Ambas partes acordaron sostener el 22 de julio en la ZIK la 5a ronda.

articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion de Parlamento Europeo
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio el dia 18 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion para las relaciones con la Peninsula Coreana del Parlamento Europeo encabezada por el presidente Herbert REUL que le hizo una visita de cortesia. 
					 Estuvo presente Ri Jong Hyok, presidente del grupo parlamentario de amistad RPDC-Union Europea.

articles.title: Finalizados preparativos de la nueva version de "Arirang"
articles.content:
Finalizados preparativos de la nueva version de "Arirang"
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Terminaron en Corea los preparativos para la funcion gimnastico-artistica "Arirang", uno de los actos de festejo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Los creadores y ejecutantes presentaran en la edicion de "Arirang" de este ano las perfectas y novedosas escenas.
					
					 Los capitulos, escenas, canciones, los dibujos y letras de la pizarra humana demostraran en sintesis las imperecederas hazanas del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung por la victoria en la guerra y las proezas del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il realizadas en la revolucion del Songun.
					
					 Ademas describiran en lo ideo-artistico las cualidades de gran hombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el impetu heroico de todo el ejercito y pueblo coreanos que adelantan la victoria final bajo su direccion.
					
					 Kim Mok Ryong, director general de la funcion, dijo que la presente version es el fruto de gran pasion de los creadores y ejecutantes que dedicaron toda su inteligencia y esfuerzos con el deseo de dar las mas calidas felicitaciones a la patria madre que acogera pronto el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la guerra.
					
					 Segun lo programado, sera inaugurada el dia 22 en el Estadio Primero de Mayo la funcion gimnastico-artistica "Arirang" que produjo fuertes repercusiones en los espectadores extranjeros que la calificaron de "mejor obra maestra del siglo 21" y "espectaculo visible solo en Corea".
